## TransactableProtocol.borrowDebtToken() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more DebtToken.

**Signature:**

```typescript
borrowDebtToken(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<TroveAdjustmentDetails>;
```

The amount of DebtToken to borrow.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

[Decimalish](./stablecoin-lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./stablecoin-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./stablecoin-lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ borrowDebtToken: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)
```
